attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Headteachers are using Cover Supervisors and Higher Level Teaching Assistants to cover the long term absences of Qualified Teachers, when those teachers are suffering long term illness or on maternity leave. This practise is in breach of the workforce agreement, and should cease immediately.

 We the undersigned, demand the government investigate this deliberate dilution of the teaching of the national curriculum by non-teachers.
